alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Calcasieu; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 5:31PM CDT until July 22 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jefferson Davis Parish in southwestern Louisiana... West central Acadia Parish in southwestern Louisiana... East central Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 531 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lebleu Settlement to Mermentau, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Jennings, Welsh, Iowa, Lake Arthur, Mermentau, Hayes, Moss Bluff, Evangeline, Buller, Lebleu Settlement, Thornwell, Roanoke, Lacassine and Bell City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 29 and 70. Interstate 210 between mile markers 3 and 12. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
